introduction: You can register with the NHS to add your name to the NHS Organ Donation Register. You can specify what organs you'd like to donate after your death.
more_information:
The NHS Organ Donor Register is confidential.

Putting your name on the register means authorised medical staff will be aware of your wishes to donate organs if you die. 

If you're under 18, your parents or guardians will be consulted if you've registered for organ donation.

%It's important to discuss your wishes with your family.%
